posts.post_content:
I got a large lot of T206s back from SGC this afternoon. Selling these SGC 40s for $35 each, or 2 or more for $30 each, delivered. Payment via PayPal friends/family. 

Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested.

Thanks for looking!

ALL SOLD

[quote name="t206kid" post=1708014]I'll take Pelty and Seymour.[/QUOTE]

Sorry - they all just sold as a lot.  Thanks for your interest!
